title: Rehabilitation and Physical Medicine at Orlando Health Orlando Regional Medical Center
description: Home to Central Florida's Level One Trauma Center, Orlando Health Orlando Regional Medical Center in Orlando, FL provides urgent care to the most critically-ill patients.
cleaned_text: Rehabilitation and Physical Medicine Helping each patient regain the best possible health, quality of life and independence is the goal of Orlando Health's rehabilitation programs. We offer rehabilitation services serving a full spectrum of short-term and long-term rehabilitation needs - from hip fracture, joint replacement and sports medicine programs to stroke, traumatic brain injury cardiac surgery and oncology/lymphedema rehabilitation.
